meanings.definition: A deceptive trick or cunning scheme.
meanings.sent1: The villain used a dolos to trick the hero into a trap.
meanings.sent2: She saw through his dolos and avoided falling for his scheme.
meanings.sent3: The dolos he played on his friends was so clever, they couldn't help but laugh.
meanings.sent4: His dolos was like a spider's web, entangling all who dared to approach.
meanings.sent5: The dolos of the magician left the audience in awe of his cleverness.

meanings.definition: A type of concrete structure used to break up wave action at harbors or coastal protection works.
meanings.sent1: The engineers installed dolos along the coast to protect the harbor from strong waves.
meanings.sent2: The dolos at the harbor effectively reduced the impact of the waves on the shore.
meanings.sent3: The dolos looked like giant concrete jigsaw pieces scattered along the coastline.
meanings.sent4: The dolos stood strong against the relentless waves, like guardians of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The dolos created a mesmerizing pattern as the waves crashed against them.
